summary: Develop a RESTful API endpoint (GET /api/v2/transactions/history) to retrieve unified customer transaction history across all partner banks in an Open Banking context. Key features: OAuth 2.0 authentication, pagination, date/type/institution filtering, OpenAPI compliance, UTC timestamp normalization, de-duplication, ISO 27001 audit logging. Performance requirement: 1.5s response time for 24 months of data. Handle partner API outages gracefully with partial results. Requires integration with 5+ major banks, 5-minute cache freshness limit, and compliance review before production.
